text: Crow was a Sioux chief who gave the opening battle cry at the Battle of the Little Big Horn. ==References== *Lafarge, Oliver. (MCMLVI). A Pictorial History of the American Indian. Crown Publishers Inc. Page 177. Category:Native American leaders Category:Native American people of the Indian Wars Category:People of the Great Sioux War of 1876 Category:Sioux people Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death missing
title: Crow (Sioux leader)
